name: Artboard Title Creator
description: Create artboard titles for artboards on current page.
author: Jason Burns

commands.name: Create Titles for Artboards on Page
commands.description: Create artboard titles for artboards on current page.

commands.name: Include Selected Artboards
commands.description: Include selected artboards when creating artboard titles.

commands.name: Preclude Selected Artboards
commands.description: Preclude selected artboards when creating artboard titles.

commands.name: Report Issue
commands.description: Report an issue with Artboard Title Creator.

commands.name: Donate
commands.description: Donate to the development of Artboard Title Creator.
